text_logic_form: The triangles $RST$ and $UVW$ are similar to each other.
Line $TA$ is a median of triangle $UVW$.
Line $WB$ is a median of triangle $UVW$.
The length of the line $TA$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $RA$ is $3$ units.
The length of the line $WB$ is $3x - 6$ units.
The length of the line $UB$ is $x + 2$ units.
Find the length of the line $UB$.

diagram_logic_form: Point $B$ lies on the line connecting $U$ and $V$.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $S$.
line_instances: There are lines $UV$, $BU$, $BV$, $BW$, $WU$, and $WV$ forming a triangle $UVW$ and its medians.
